segment.set up: To set up a new source in Segment, follow these steps: 1) Log in to your Segment account, 2) Navigate to the Sources page, 3) Click 'Add Source', 4) Configure source settings as per your requirements. For more details, visit: https://segment.com/docs/sources/

mparticle.profile: To create a user profile in mParticle, please see the user management section of the documentation: https://docs.mparticle.com/guides/user-profiles/

lytics.audience: Building an audience segment in Lytics is achieved by navigating to the Audience Builder, selecting your desired filters, and saving the segment. More info: https://docs.lytics.com/audience-segmentation/

zeotap.integrate: To integrate your data with Zeotap, you need to follow our data ingestion guide which explains how to configure data pipelines: https://docs.zeotap.com/integrations/
